content: Equities Stocks Securities Investments Asked by Donald Kieran AngAsked on 07 Apr 2019Currently invested in SG stocks mainly in Reits. starting to invest in S&p500 and MsCI World index via IWDA and VUSD. Any thoughts of investing in Nasdaq for my portfolio and which Irish-Don etf? 1 answerAnswerBump0

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019You can take a look at EQQU and CNDX. There is already overlap for S&P 500 and MSCI world index so it might not be a very good idea to get NASDAQ 100 as well.4 comments0

See all 4 comments Nicholes Wong07 Apr 2019If u are bullish on FAANG and are ok with overlap, then nasdaq 100 is good for that.Donald Kieran Ang08 Apr 2019I thought of liquidating all my holdings in the Singapore Market (mainly Reits) and directing thme to those Etfs. U think is it a good idea for that?
